revised_title: Cecil Reginald Burch: A Pioneering Scientist and Inventor
tldr: Cecil Reginald Burch was a renowned scientist and inventor who made significant contributions to various fields, including eddy-current heating, evaporative distillation, vacuum pumps, and mineral dressing. He was known for his exceptional mathematical ability, manual dexterity, and persistence in his work. Burch's life and achievements are celebrated in this biographical memoir.
